text:
How mobile phone changed the world
To begin, i will start to introduce one of the biggest technology revolution of the world: the mobile phone. The first one was sold in 1983 in Paris. Since 1983, innovation, progress, and invention are goals for mobile phone compagnies. In fact, nowadays, we can write messages, call one or several persons wherever you want, record our voices, take pictures and videos and do much more things with a mobile phone.
 In my opinion, mobile phone has good and bad sides. I will take an example to talk about each sides.
First of all, the mobile phone has totally changed our way to live our lifes. For exemple, thanks to this invention, people which were far away from us, can be online at the same time as us. This is quiet amazing. So, the sad feelings when you miss somebody can be erase thanks to the mobile phone.
However, In my mind, it is seems like we can do anything with a mobile phone. It is a little bit scarrying. In fact, we have to prevent every mobile phone user about the dangers it can produce. Furthemore, with Internet the danger increase a lot. This technological inventions can destroy people lifes, just if you meet bad people online or talk with a malicious person.
